sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Form, Button, Col, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap';
import Landing from './Landing';

const ProfileForm = () => {
  const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState();
  const [lastName, setLastName] = useState();
  const [email, setEmail] = useState();
  const [company, setCompany] = useState();
  const [website, setWebsite] = useState();
  const [location, setLocation] = useState();
  const [skills, setSkills] = useState();
  const [gitHub, setGithub] = useState();
  const [bio, setBio] = useState();
  const [linkedIn, setLinkedIn] = useState();
  const [youtube, setYoutube] = useState();

  return (
    <Container>
      <form
        className=''
        onSubmit={e => {
          e.preventDefault();
        }}
      >
        <Container>
          <Form.Group controlId='formGridEmail'>
            <Form.Label>Firstname</Form.Label>
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setFirstName(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='Enter your Firstname'
            />
          </Form.Group>
          <Form.Group controlId='formGridEmail'>
            <Form.Label>Lastname</Form.Label>
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setLastName(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='Enter your Lastname'
            />
          </Form.Group>
          <Form.Group controlId='formGridEmail'>
            <Form.Label>Email</Form.Label>
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setEmail(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='Enter your Email'
            />
          </Form.Group>
          <Form.Group controlId='formGridEmail'>
            <Form.File id='formcheck-api-custom' custom>
              <Form.File.Input isInvalid />
              <Form.Label>Company</Form.Label>
              {
                <Form.Control
                  type='text'
                  size='lg'
                  onChange={event => setCompany(event.target.value)}
                  placeholder="Enter your Company's Name"
                />
              }
              <Form.Control.Feedback type='valid'>
                You did it!
              </Form.Control.Feedback>
              <Form.Control.Feedback type='invalid'>
                Please fill out this field
              </Form.Control.Feedback>
            </Form.File>
            {/*  <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setCompany(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder="Enter your Company's Name"
            /> */}
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridPassword'>
            <Form.Label>Website</Form.Label>
            {/* <Form.Control size='lg' placeholder="Enter your website's Adress" /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setWebsite(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder="Enter your website's Adress"
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridAddress1'>
            <Form.Label>Location</Form.Label>
            {/*    <Form.Control size='lg' placeholder='1234 Main St' /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setLocation(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='1234 Main St'
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridAddress2'>
            <Form.Label>Skills</Form.Label>
            {/* <Form.Control size='lg' placeholder='Enter your skills' /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setSkills(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='Enter your skills'
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridCity'>
            <Form.Label>GitHub Username</Form.Label>
            {/*  <Form.Control
              size='lg'
              placeholder="Enter your GitHub's Username"
            /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setGithub(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder="Enter your GitHub's Username"
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridState'>
            <Form.Label>Bio</Form.Label>
            {/* <Form.Control size='lg' placeholder='Enter your Bio' /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setBio(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder='Enter your Bio'
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridState'>
            <Form.Label>LinkedIn</Form.Label>
            {/*  <Form.Control
              size='lg'
              placeholder="Enter your LinkedIn's Username"
            /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setLinkedIn(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder="Enter your LinkedIn's Username"
            />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group controlId='formGridZip'>
            <Form.Label>Youtube</Form.Label>
            {/*  <Form.Control
              size='lg'
              placeholder="Enter your Youtube's Username"
            /> */}
            <input
              className='form-control'
              onChange={event => setYoutube(event.target.value)}
              type='text'
              placeholder="Enter your Youtube's Username"
            />
          </Form.Group>
        </Container>
        <button
          className='btn btn-primary btn-lg'
          onClick={e => {
            e.preventDefault();
            console.log(company);
          }}
          type='submit'
        >
          Submit
        </button>
        <Button variant='primary' type='submit'>
          Submit
        </Button>
      </form>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default ProfileForm;
